name: tm18
effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Counter)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
